secretary wrote:
> and now we have...
> MIRROR MIRROR
> which was written by Barbara Sheridan who for many years has 
> supported Shinsengumihq.com financially and oversaw this list with 
> her awesome omnipotence and wisdom

Omnipotence and wisdom--that cracks me up every time I see it.

Anyway, the multi-talented Child #2 has designed the very cool manga 
style cover for said book and the publisher has deemed it to be 
"Perfect" so I give you the Official Website!!!

You can see the cover under the About the book link at the site below. 
At the Characters link you can find out which Shinsengumi members appear 
and get the low down on some other historically inspired stuffs...

http://chloemichelle.com
